Keywords: Defenders , Mystical , Speedster , Warp World , Weapon X , X-Men
Real Name: Gavrill Kinney
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
CAN'T CATCH ME, SNAIL KISSERS!: When Speed Weasel uses Blades/Claws/Fangs or Super Senses, after resolutions you may place her up to X squares away from her current square where X is equal to the d6 result.
RUN, RUN, RUN. BREAK, BREAK, BREAK: Charge. // Once per turn when Speed Weasel is given a CLOSE destroy action, after resolutions she can use Charge as FREE.

November 5, 2021
Gensan
[QUOTE=peeterparkker;12164501]She can only charge 14. CLOSE object destroy isn’t an attack so you can’t use blades. She can definitely charge, CLOSE destroy, charge, hit someone for 6 and THEN finish a 20 total movement.[/QUOTE] My comment pointed out that I pulled/used Tempo with her. So I modified Speed Weasel's Speed by +3, allowing each Charge to be 10 squares. Charge 10, CLOSE Destroy, Charge 10 more and attack with Blades, hopefully roll high on Blades and disappear.
November 4, 2021
peeterparkker
[QUOTE=Gensan;12154721]I pulled her in a sealed and used her alongside Tempo. Nothing quite like charging 20 squares across the entire map to one-shot the opponents' most important character, then teleporting behind a wall due to a 5 on Blades. Can really fall short if the d6 rolls aren't high for her trait, but still very good at the alpha strike.[/QUOTE] She can only charge 14. CLOSE object destroy isn’t an attack so you can’t use blades. She can definitely charge, CLOSE destroy, charge, hit someone for 6 and THEN finish a 20 total movement.
August 31, 2021
Gensan
I pulled her in a sealed and used her alongside Tempo. Nothing quite like charging 20 squares across the entire map to one-shot the opponents' most important character, then teleporting behind a wall due to a 5 on Blades. Can really fall short if the d6 rolls aren't high for her trait, but still very good at the alpha strike.
August 27, 2021
Dagguh
Carried my entire team to victory. You don't expect her to do much until you see her in action. She is always bouncing around the battlefield and shredding the tanks. Pleasant surprise of the set for me.
August 12, 2021
Goop
Ridiculous amount of mobility on this fig. Long charge into a long charge and then you are bouncing around on bcf or SS. All her values are great, mostly all 11 or 18s. Looks like a lot of fun. How good will probably depend on the map you get and how much you can exploit elevated terrain with her.
June 2, 2021
A.O.D.
Potential 20 speed. Charge 7 Destroy Wall. Charge another 7 bcf, exploit, and roll a 6 get get placed that many squares. With Mystics, good atk value, and low points. Seems to be a really good figure.
